AlnConstants.hh

00001 #ifndef TBTrack_AlnConstants_HH
00002 #define TBTrack_AlnConstants_HH
00003 
00004 // Constants needed for conversion of TDC values
00005 // to space coordinates (and vice versa for MC)
00006 
00007 #include <string>
00008 #include <iostream>
00009 
00010 
00011 //Forces the compiler to aling this class on a 32 bit boundary
00012 //Needed to protect implemented type 'safety' check
00013 #pragma pack (4)
00014 namespace TBTrack {
00015 
00016 class AlnConstants {
00017 
00018 public:
00019   //AlnConstants(bool desy=true, bool data=true);
00020   AlnConstants(int period=0, int dataType=2);
00021 
00022   // TDC unit in ns (info only; not needed for alignment)
00023   double tdcUnit() const;
00024   void   tdcUnit(double t);
00025 
00026   // d is dimension; 0 = x, 1 = y
00027   // l is layer; 0-3 for DESY, 0-2 for CERN
00028 
00029   // Coordinate when TDC value = 0 in mm
00030   double cTzero(unsigned d, unsigned l) const;
00031   void   cTzero(unsigned d, unsigned l, double c);
00032 
00033   // Drift velocity in mm/TDC units
00034   double vDrift(unsigned d, unsigned l) const;
00035   void   vDrift(unsigned d, unsigned l, double v);
00036   
00037   // Drift velocity quadratic term in mm/TDC units^2
00038   double vDquad(unsigned d, unsigned l) const;
00039   void   vDquad(unsigned d, unsigned l, double q);
00040   
00041   // Conversion from TDC value to coordinate in mm
00042   double coordinate(unsigned d, unsigned l, int t) const;
00043 
00044   // Conversion from coordinate (with time) to TDC value (for MC)
00045   int tdcValue(unsigned d, unsigned l, double c, double t=0.0) const;
00046 
00047   std::ostream& print(std::ostream &o=std::cout, const std::string &s="") const;
00048 
00049   enum {numberOfInts=0};
00050   const int* intData() const;
00051         int* intData();
00052 
00053   enum {numberOfFloats=0};
00054   const float* floatData() const;
00055         float* floatData();
00056 
00057   enum {numberOfDoubles=1+3*2*4};
00058   const double* doubleData() const;
00059         double* doubleData();
00060 
00061 protected:
00062 
00063   // Tracking chamber constants
00064   double _tdcUnit;
00065   double _cTzero[2][4];
00066   double _vDrift[2][4];
00067   double _vDquad[2][4];
00068 };
00069 
00070 }
00071 
00072 //Reset the alignment
00073 #pragma pack()
00074 #endif
